name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
Wear a mask. The pandemic isn't over. 

Wash your hands often. The pandemic isn't over.

Be smart. The pandemic isn't over.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
We cannot let this pandemic rob survivors of their day in court.

I just signed legislation extending the window to file claims under the Child Victims Act until August 14, 2021

This extension will help ensure that abusers are held accountable.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
At the start of the pandemic, @CSiriano was the first fashion designer to answer the call to manufacture masks.

NY is proud to award his firm a grant to continue to produce COVID-related supplies.

Christian is symbolic of the incredible community spirit of all New Yorkers. https://twitter.com/CSiriano/status/1289005707266863104Â â€¦

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
Americans should never again rely on foreign supplies during a pandemic.

The fed gov took a smart step today in using the Defense Production Act to award the great NY company @Kodak a $765M loan for medical manufacturing.

We're happy to have worked w/ the WH to make this happen https://twitter.com/Kodak/status/1288196689988407298Â â€¦

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
Here is where denial got us.

Five months into this pandemic our nation is totally unprepared.

This virus thrives on denial.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
In the middle of a global pandemic, the Trump admin wants the Supreme Court to strike down the entire Affordable Care Act.

They have no plans to replace it.

20 million Americans will lose their health care.

It's morally bankrupt and reckless.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet: Thanks to @kellycummingsny, Joe Rabito and the State Operations team and all of our agencies for leading the testing, response, and enforcement operations throughout the pandemic.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
Yesterday there were 17 fatalities due to COVID. We mourn those we lost.

But we are thankful this is the lowest number since the pandemic began.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
Since reopening, almost half the states have seen an increase in COVID cases.

That hasnâ€™t happened in New York.

Letâ€™s keep it that way.

The pandemic isnâ€™t over and we MUST keep being vigilant.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
Yesterday we lost 32 New Yorkers to Coronavirus.

This is the lowest number of COVID-related fatalities since this pandemic started.

We also saw the lowest number of total hospitalizations since March 20th.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet: It is my honor to sign into law a bill that gives death benefits to all the frontline workers who gave their lives in service to all of us during this pandemic. Providing for their families is the least we can do.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
As we reopen NYC we are laser-focused on the 10 hotspots where infection rates are highest.

It is not just coincidence that the hotspots are in low-income and minority communities.

The inequality in health outcomes of this pandemic is just one of countless inequalities.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
States have taken on many of the tough jobs in this pandemic â€” testing, tracing, reopening. 

But states can't do this alone â€” we need help from the federal government.

Stop shortchanging the hardest hit states like NY.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
During this pandemic, there has been a tragic spike in Domestic Violence cases.

We're launching a task force to come up with innovative solutions.

Remember: If you are in a dangerous situation, we will help you find safe shelter. Call 1-800-942-6906

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
If people get arrogant and casual about this pandemic, you will see the infection rate go up.

Itâ€™s that simple.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
This pandemic is also a mental heath crisis.

NY wants you to know: You are not alone. 

If you need support, call the New York State Emotional Support Hotline at 1-844-863-9314.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
If a corporation gets a check from the government, they must rehire the same number of workers after the pandemic as employed before.

Taxpayers shouldnâ€™t subsidize companies that lay off workers.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
Communities of color have been disproportionately & unfairly impacted by this pandemic.

This partnership will help us tackle these inequities.

Thank you to @RepJeffries @NydiaVelazquez @RepYvetteClarke and our many partners in the faith community for making this possible.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
NEW: New York is partnering with @NorthwellHealth to open 24 temporary COVID testing sites at churches in predominantly low-income communities & communities of color.

We must address the racial disparities of this pandemic, and meet the need where it is.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
Our teachers and students have risen to the occasion during this pandemic and worked hard via remote learning.

But nothing can ever replace in-class learning.

When we reopen, a new advisory council will help us strengthen NY's education system for the future.  pic.twitter.com/uyQO3SkHMM

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
I will continue to give New Yorkers the facts, whether the facts are pretty or ugly.

Every one of us, through our actions, will shape the course of this pandemic.

Thatâ€™s why itâ€™s so important to know the facts and stay informed.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
We lost 232 New Yorkers yesterday to #Coronavirus. 

That is 232 families that are suffering today.

Yes, we have made great progress in bringing down hospitalizations.

But it is completely wrong to say that the pandemic is â€œover."

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
When it is safe to reopen, NYS will set the bar high.

We have the opportunity to Build Back Better.

We canâ€™t waste the many lessons of this pandemic.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
One of the greatest concerns of the pandemic is making sure all New Yorkers have access to food. No New Yorker should go to bed hungry. 

To find a food pantry that services your county, visit  http://ny.gov/foodbanksÂ  pic.twitter.com/NtxQqbjV6w

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
We know many pregnant women are struggling with additional stress & anxiety during this pandemic.

I adopted the recommendations of the COVID-19 Maternity Task Force, led by @melissadderosa, to try to address any additional pain points for expectant mothers.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
New York is still seeing about 2,000 COVID hospitalizations per day.

If people tell you the pandemic is "over" â€” they're wrong.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
We are partnering with the NYS Court System to provide pro bono legal assistance to help people with issues resulting from the #Coronavirus pandemic.

We need more volunteers.

Lawyers interested in volunteering can sign up here:  http://www.nysba.org/covidvolunteerÂ

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
No one should go hungry because of this pandemic.

NYS will provide $200 million in emergency food assistance to more than 700K low-income households enrolled in SNAP.

Food is a very real issue for many families.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
New Yorkers will do what we have to do.

The next phase of this pandemic is not preordained.

It all depends on what we do next.

#StayHome

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
The death toll of this pandemic is more than a number.

Behind the numbers are human beings and families and grief and pain and heartbreak.

We can't become numb to it.  pic.twitter.com/4yXH4z1prh

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
How well we stay apart will directly impact the outcome of this pandemic.

Social distancing saves lives.

Spread the word. #NewYorkTough pic.twitter.com/E1E0qg8qZO

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
How bad will this pandemic be?

One of the main variables is how effective social distancing is.

That means YOU can influence the outcome.

Stay Home. Save Lives.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
The mental health impact of this pandemic is very real.

New York is here to help.

Get free emotional support, consultation, and referral to a provider.

Call the State's Emotional Support Hotline at 1-844-863-9314

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
Stay informed.

Get nightly updates with critical information on the #Coronavirus pandemic and New Yorkâ€™s response:  https://on.ny.gov/3am2DVVÂ  https://cards.twitter.com/cards/qfdmzm/97girÂ â€¦

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
The Four Seasons Hotel on 57th Street will provide FREE lodging to doctors, nurses & medical personnel currently working to respond to the #COVID19 pandemic.

Thank you @FourSeasons. 

The first of many hotels we hope will make their rooms available.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
In NY we are concerned about the mental health part of this pandemic, too.

We canâ€™t underestimate that.

For FREE emotional support, consultation, and referral to a provider, call 1-844-863-9314

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
The federal government must distribute ventilators based on need.

We need them in New York NOW.

After New York gets past the apex of this pandemic, I will transport the ventilators myself wherever they are next needed.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
The apex of this pandemic is higher & sooner than we thought. 

We believe we are 14-21 days away from this apex.

We are scaling hospital capacity as fast as humanly possible.

I will turn this state upside down to get the hospital beds we need.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
#BREAKING: New York will implement a 90-day moratorium on evictions for residential and commercial tenants.

We will do all we can to help those financially suffering because of the #COVID19 pandemic.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet: Making an announcement on the State's response to the #Coronavirus pandemic. WATCH:  https://www.pscp.tv/w/cUOCKTIyNjcxMDN8MXJteFBBUndRRVFLTkE5y1Q5VHfWXX00PHZBp11aj9xtrZHmsqznm6aVHYP6Â â€¦

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet: Providing an update on the #Coronavirus pandemic. WATCH LIVE:  https://www.pscp.tv/w/cUDjhDIyNjcxMDN8MVJER2xRa1dMQk9KTLSK625zpGH8ohZbntpuNu2R3aCqxOoAqMaiYZWps7xdÂ â€¦

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
Stay informed. 

Sign up for email updates from New York State with critical information on the #Coronavirus pandemic here:  https://on.ny.gov/2xP6z37Â  https://cards.twitter.com/cards/qfdmzm/97girÂ â€¦

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
Identifying a reserve staff is a key part of our mitigation strategy.

NYS has reached out to all nursing schools, medical schools, and public health schools in NYS to encourage qualified students & staff to sign up for on-call work during the #COVID19 pandemic.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
NYS is preparing for potential staffing shortages during the #Coronavirus pandemic.

We are seeking recently retired health professionals as reserve staff if the need arises.

If that's you â€” please complete this survey:  https://on.ny.gov/2TWXei7Â 
ðŸ“¢Please share far and wide.ðŸ“¢

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
As we see the novel #coronavirus spread, we are continuing to take all necessary precautions to protect New Yorkers from this virus.

Today I'm announcing new actions to help ensure our healthcare systems & hospitals are equipped to respond to a potential COVID-19 pandemic.

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
Thank you to the great NY startup @Codecademy for being a part of the @NYSITS led #NYSTechSWAT initiative.

The work of state government never stopped during the pandemic. This pro-bono partnership helped ensure it.  https://twitter.com/Codecademy/status/1293927926052855809Â â€¦

name: Andrew Cuomo
tweet:
We need to protect the extraordinary progress New Yorkers have made.

Todayâ€™s infection rate of 0.78% is the lowest we have seen since the pandemic began. 

What we are doing is working. We need to stay smart and stay cautious.
